title: AI Codeathon for Infectious Diseases
desc: Join us for a three-day hands-on AI Codeathon uniting experts to tackle critical challenges in infectious disease research using artificial intelligence (AI) and large language models (LLMs).

title: BV-BRC August 2025 Updates
desc: Check out the recent updates from the BV-BRC team. Read more about our AI Copilot and new services here.

title: BV-BRC Quick Start Guides
desc: Quick start guides and short video tutorials designed to orient new users as well as users from the legacy PATRIC, IRD and ViPR resources to the new BV-BRC Resource.

title: Bacterial Bioinformatics Course on Coursera
desc: The BV-BRC offers an online Bacterial Bioinformatics course, freely available through Coursera. This course provides demonstrations and exercises for performing common genomics-based analysis tasks of bacterial sequence data.

title: BV-BRC Renewal
desc: The BV-BRC will continue to be supported by NIAID under Award Number U24Al183849. We will continue to support all of the current datasets and tools along with existing (and new) user workspaces. Additional enhancements to our data and tools will also be coming in future updates.
